verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it.

And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with <S%H7117>part<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> which he <S%H935>carried<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>god;<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> into the <S%H214>treasure<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>god.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H828>Ashpenaz<s%> the <S%H7227>master<s%> of his <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> that he should <S%H935>bring<s%> certain of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and of the <S%H4410>king's<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and of the <S%H6579>princes;<s%>

<S%H3206>Children<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> but <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored,<s%> and <S%H7919>skillful<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H3045>cunning<s%> in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H4093>science,<s%> and such as had <S%H3581>ability<s%> in them to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1964>palace,<s%> and whom they might <S%H3925>teach<s%> the <S%H5612>learning<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3779>Chaldeans.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> them a <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>provision<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat,<s%> and of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which he <S%H4960>drank:<s%> so <S%H1431>nourishing<s%> them <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that at the <S%H7117>end<s%> thereof they might <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
Now among <S%H1992>these<s%> were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah:<s%>

To <S%H1992>whom<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H7760>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names:<s%> for he <S%H7760>gave<s%> to <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1095>Belteshazzar;<s%> and to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> of <S%H7714>Shadrach;<s%> and to <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> of <S%H4335>Meshach;<s%> and to <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> of <S%H5664>Abednego.<s%>

But <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H7760>purposed<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> that he would not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself with the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat,<s%> nor with the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which he <S%H4960>drank:<s%> therefore he <S%H1245>requested<s%> of the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> that he might not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself.
Now <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>brought<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> into <S%H2617>favor<s%> and tender love with the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> I <S%H3373>fear<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H4487>appointed<s%> your <S%H3978>meat<s%> and your <S%H4960>drink:<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> should he <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2196>worse<s%> liking <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are of your <S%H1524>sort?<s%> then shall you make me <S%H2325>endanger<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> to <S%H4453>Melzar,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> had <S%H4487>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>

<S%H5254>Prove<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H2235>vegetables<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Then let our <S%H4758>countenances<s%> be <S%H7200>looked<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and the <S%H4758>countenance<s%> of the <S%H3206>children<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat:<s%> and as you <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
So he <S%H8085>consented<s%> to them in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and <S%H5254>proved<s%> them <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> their <S%H4758>countenances<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H2896>fairer<s%> and <S%H1277>fatter<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat.<s%>

Thus <S%H4453>Melzar<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> away the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of their <S%H6598>meat,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> that they should <S%H4960>drink;<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H2235>vegetables.<s%>

As for <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3206>children,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> and <S%H7919>skill<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5612>learning<s%> and <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> and <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> had <S%H995>understanding<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> and <S%H2472>dreams.<s%>

Now at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he should <S%H935>bring<s%> them in, then the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> them in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them; and among them <S%H3605>all<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> like <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah:<s%> therefore <S%H5975>stood<s%> they <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>inquired<s%> of them, he <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H6235>ten<s%> times <S%H3027>better<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> and <S%H825>astrologers<s%> that were in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>realm.<s%>
And <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H1961>continued<s%> even to the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus.<s%>
